title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Entrance Fee Season:   May 1 - October 31 annually.  Entrance Fees: valid for 7 days  Cars -- $5.00 per private, noncommercial vehicle Bicycles / Motorcycles / Hiking / Horseback Riding -- $3.00 per adult (age 16 and up)            Park-Specific Annual Pass  Saratoga National Historical Park Annual Pass: $10              Interagency Pass: Annual Pass  Available to general public: $80            Interagency Pass: Senior Pass  Lifetime pass, available to US citizens age 62 and over: $10             Interagency Pass: Access Pass  Lifetime pass, available to US citizens with a permanent disability: free            Interagency Pass: Military Annual Pass  Available to active duty US military and their dependents: free            Interagency Pass: Every Kid in a Park Pass  Available to current US 4th Grade Students: free
